Issue.creator: burdettadam
Issue.summary: VCX NodeJS Wrapper: Known High Severity Security Vulnerability in 'lodash'
Issue.description: The GitHub security has found the following issue:We found a potential security vulnerability in a repository for which you have been granted security alert access in hyperledeger/indy-sdkKnown high severity security vulnerability detected in lodash <4.17.5 defined in: https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk/blob/master/vcx/wrappers/node/package-lock.jsonpackage-lock.json update suggested: lodash ~> 4.17.5.
